text: Egh nɨ nan akurvaghsɨ, nɨ uamategh nguibar ekiamɨn mangɨ, Apsalomɨn ganigh kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm, ‘O atrivim, kɨ fomɨra nɨghnɨzir aghuiba nɨn afeziam ganɨngi, egha datɨrɨghɨn kɨ nɨn ingangarir gumazimɨn otivasa.’ Nɨ kamaghɨn damightɨ, nɨghnɨzir nɨ Apsalom ganɨdir kam, a Ahitofel Apsalom ganɨngizir nɨghnɨzim atugham.
